answerText: Tony Last [10] Tony Last is declared dead and Hetton Abbey passes to another member of the Last family at the end of this 1934 novel, in which Brenda leaves Tony for John Beaver.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Los Angeles B and Iowa | 1 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: After traveling to the Amazon, this character is taken captive by the insane Mr. Todd and forced to continuously read aloud the works of Charles Dickens.   [10] Name this husband of Lady Brenda who abandons England after refusing to submit to a divorce.
